title: Initial sync stall
body:

I don't see a response for request `15a146c8d78de13e`, should  be a timeout issue but somehow it did not trigger error.

There are multiple logs like below
```
2020-08-01 09:59:08  [NETWORK]       verbose: sending status request to 16Uiu2HAm1gPDqPY4qkMvyjSjXWESF8U9S72KesxRxENSYw3QViBD requestId=fc645b2b89bd5dfa, encoding=ssz_snappy
...
2020-08-01 09:59:22  [NETWORK]       verbose: got stream to 16Uiu2HAm1gPDqPY4qkMvyjSjXWESF8U9S72KesxRxENSYw3QViBD requestId=fc645b2b89bd5dfa, encoding=ssz_snappy
```
after I add more log to `sendRequestStream`
```
logger.verbose(`sending ${method} request to ${peerId.toB58String()}`, {requestId, encoding});
      const {stream} = await dialProtocol(libp2p, peerId, protocol, TTFB_TIMEOUT) as {stream: Stream};
      logger.verbose(`got stream to ${peerId.toB58String()}`, {requestId, encoding});
```
it's been more than 10secs and no error thrown
so the issue is `dialProtocol()` did not throw error even it's a timeout issue

this one is even worse
```
2020-08-01 10:03:42  [NETWORK]       verbose: sending status request to 16Uiu2HAm1gPDqPY4qkMvyjSjXWESF8U9S72KesxRxENSYw3QViBD requestId=9f2b35a4816bf97c, encoding=ssz_snappy
...
2020-08-01 10:06:17  [NETWORK]       verbose: got stream to 16Uiu2HAm1gPDqPY4qkMvyjSjXWESF8U9S72KesxRxENSYw3QViBD requestId=9f2b35a4816bf97c, encoding=ssz_snappy
```
